trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> which should receive scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: Classe de designer para alargar o comportamento de modo de estrutura de base um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que deve receber mensagens de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: ScrollableControlDesigner provides a base class for designers of controls that respond to scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: ScrollableControlDesigner fornece uma classe base para os estruturadores de controlos que respondeu se deslocar para mensagens.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> classes, ScrollableControlDesigner provides a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method override that passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Para além de métodos e a funcionalidade herdado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>classes, ScrollableControlDesigner fornece um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>substituição de método que passa mensagens WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL ao controlo no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a form has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property set to active, the scroll bars are always active in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um formulário tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade definida como ativa, barras de deslocamento sempre estão ativas no ambiente do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Pode associar um designer com um tipo com um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição geral de personalizar o comportamento de tempo de design, consulte [expandir o momento da conceção suporte](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um clique do rato no ponto de especificado deve ser processado pelo controlo.

trans-unit.source: The GetHitTest method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode.
trans-unit.target: O método GetHitTest determina se um clique no ponto de especificado deve ser transmitido ao controlo, enquanto o controlo está em modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir e implemente este método para ativar o controlo receber cliques no ambiente de tempo de criação.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode transmitir um ponto no ecrã de coordenadas para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe para obter as coordenadas do ponto relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que indica a posição em que foi clicado o rato, em coordenadas do ecrã.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um clique no ponto especificado está a ser processada pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages and passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows e transmite WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL mensagens para o controlo no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: This override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method passes any WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Esta substituição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>método transmite as mensagens WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL ao controlo no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: All messages are first passed to the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens primeiro são transmitidas para a base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A>
